column2:
"You seem to be holding your own. I don't think I have to worry about
you."
"When fighting Darkers, you can run into problems, like letting your guard down."
"Darkers infect and spread their influence onto other beings; like increasing violent tendencies."
"It's said that ARKS aren't affected, but that's not guaranteed."
"They really are troublesome, they just keep coming in an endless stream, or so it seems."
"At least it's somewhat reassuring to know they can be destroyed with photon weapons."
